official_title: A bill to authorize an Under Secretary of Commerce for Economic Affairs.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Establishes the position of Under Secretary of Commerce for Economic Affairs in the Department of Commerce. Declares that the Under Secretary shall be appointed by the President with the Senate's approval. Eliminates one of the positions of Assistant Secretary of Commerce.

titles.title: A bill to authorize an Under Secretary of Commerce for Economic Affairs.
